message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. I am willing to pay $14000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $13500.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay $13200 for the product.
I'm still not comfortable with the price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $13000.
